abilities.name: Iron Armour
abilities.details: Ar-Gon builds up layers of iron on his armour when not in combat, granting bonus [ar]physical resistance[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) each layer (maximum 5 layers).[n]Each time Ar-Gon takes physical damage, a layer will be destroyed and Ar-Gon will gain increased [ms]movement speed[/] for a short duration. The movement speed boost can be stacked.

abilities.name: Colossal Smash
abilities.details: Ar-Gon winds up his hammer and then smashes the ground, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]attack damage[/]) in a cone and briefly [db]slowing[/] all enemies hit.[n]In addition, 3 Iron Pillar will rise up at the end of the skill range, [db]obstructing all units' movement[/].[n]Using this ability reduce Ar-Gon's [db]physical resistance[/] until the Iron Pillars shatter (each Iron Pillar reduces Ar-Gon's [db]physical resistance[/] separately.). The Iron Pillars will shatter after a few seconds or when interacted with Ar-Gon's other abilities.[n]Each of the Iron Pillars has 3 bars of health points. There will only be a maximum of 3 Iron Pillars on the ground.

abilities.name: Ferric Storm
abilities.details: Ar-Gon creates floating iron shards around himself, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) to nearby enemies and reducing their [db]attack speed[/].[n]Ar-Gon can recast this ability to recall the shards back to his armour, granting himself a [sh]physical shield[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]).[n]If one or more Iron Pillars are present, Ar-Gon will shatter them during the recast to immediately recover his physical resistance stats and gains an even stronger shield based on the number of Iron Pillars shattered.

abilities.name: Heavy Slam
abilities.details: Ar-Gon slams his hammer at the target enemy, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical [power][/]) and [db]knocking[/] the target back.[n]If the target is slammed into the Iron Pillars, it will shatter the pillars, taking [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) and getting [db]stunned[/] for a short duration.[n]Slamming the enemy into a terrain will deal less damage and they will be [db]slowed[/] instead of stunned.

abilities.name: Earth Breaker
abilities.details: Ar-Gon channels his power to prepare a powerful attack. When unleashed, Ar-Gon smashes the ground, sending out a wave of rupture that deals [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ad]physical power[/]) and [db]knocks up[/] enemies upon contact.[n]When the wave of rupture touches the Iron Pillars, it will shatter them, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) to surrouding enemies and briefly [db]stunning[/] them.[n]If the enemies have already been knocked up, the stun effect takes place after the target lands. If the enemies stand behind the Iron Pillars, they will not be knocked up because the rupture wave would have stopped at the pillars. However, they can still be stunned when the Iron Pillars shatter if they stand too close.
